verses.verse: I will <S%H1984>praise<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> while I <S%H9132>live;<s%> I will <S%H2167>sing<s%> <S%H2167>praises<s%> to my <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5750>while<s%> I have my being.
Do not <S%H982>trust<s%> in <S%H5081>princes,<s%> In <S%H1121>mortal<s%> <S%H120>man,<s%> in <S%H7945>whom<s%> <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H8668>salvation.<s%>
His <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H3318>departs,<s%> he <S%H7725>returns<s%> to the <S%H127>earth;<s%> In that very <S%H3117>day<s%> his <S%H6250>thoughts<s%> perish.
How <S%H835>blessed<s%> is he <S%H7945>whose<s%> <S%H5828>help<s%> is the <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> Whose <S%H7664>hope<s%> is in the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> his <S%H430>God;<s%>
Who <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth,<s%> The <S%H3220>sea<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that is in them; Who <S%H8104>keeps<s%> <S%H571>faith<s%> <S%H5769>forever;<s%>

Who <S%H6213>executes<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> for the <S%H6231>oppressed;<s%> Who <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H3899>food<s%> to the <S%H7457>hungry.<s%> The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5425>sets<s%> the <S%H631>prisoners<s%> <S%H6605>free.<s%>

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6491>opens<s%> [the eyes of] the <S%H5787>blind;<s%> The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2210>raises<s%> up those who are <S%H3721>bowed<s%> <S%H3721>down;<s%> The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H157>loves<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous;<s%>

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8104>protects<s%> the <S%H1616>strangers;<s%> He <S%H9388>supports<s%> the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%> and the <S%H490>widow;<s%> But He <S%H5791>thwarts<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H5769>forever,<s%> Thy <S%H430>God,<s%> O <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> to <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations.<s%> <S%H1984>Praise<s%> the <S%H3050>Lord!<s%>
